name: Wodl_Eraanl
content:
Wodl Eraanl was a Human male engineers who was affiliated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Standing two meters tall, he was trained in computer programming, security, repair and specifically starship repair, and use of blasters and technology. He wore a shirt, pants and shoes and carried a blaster, syntherope, a computer repair kit, datapad, and a mini-computer.
Wodl Eraanl was created for the Rebel Characters Adventure Set, a boxed set of metal miniatures released in 1989 by West End Games to be used with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Eraanl's character type was listed as "Engineer" and his model came unpainted.
